section.title: UIDs
section.para: Every object in &api_name; has a unique identifer (UID). These are guaranteed to be unique across the entire platform, though equivalent items on different servers (stage vs live, for instance) may have different UIDs.

UIDs should not be hardcoded in client code, as there is normally a method of accessing a resource that does not require a UID. However, they are often stored as references to objects created for calculations, such as profiles or &profile_items;.
